title: IP RATING
fullText:
The pre-assembled integrated BESS installation shall have protection against ingress of solid foreign objects and against ingress of water. The pre-assembled integrated BESS shall have an IP code rating as specified in IEC 60529 for the environment in which it is to be installed.
Pre-assembled integrated BESS shall have a minimum protection of IP2X.
Pre-assembled integrated BESS installed outdoors shall have an IP rating suitable for the location and be at least of IP23.
NOTE 1 The installation of pre-assembled integrated BESS enclosures indoors may have other restrictions based on their identified hazards.
NOTE 2 IP23 is the minimum and AS/NZS 3000 may require higher rating depending on location. For example, due to the environment not being fully sealed from the effects of weather, or having water or other liquid storage system in the same location, or being in the vicinity of areas where use of a hose or washing activity of any kind may occur, or having water taps or the like.
